benchmark_details.name: OrangeSum
benchmark_details.overview: OrangeSum is a novel French summarization dataset, designed to address the lack of generative tasks in the existing FLUE benchmark, enabling the evaluation of summarization models for the French language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset for evaluating abstractive summarization models for the French language.

data.source: Scraped articles from the Orange Actu website, featuring titles and abstracts for summarization tasks.
data.annotation: Manual extraction from the scraped articles

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on n-gram overlap and contextual similarity for summarization text.
methodology.interpretation: Higher ROUGE scores indicate better alignment between generated summaries and gold references.
methodology.baseline_results: Performance comparisons against XSum and BART-based models.
methodology.validation: Model performance is validated through quantitative metrics and human evaluation.
